languages.text: Являя массам иллюзии, можно снискать немало внимания и привлечь паломников.
By showing illusions to the masses, it is possible to gain a lot of attention and attract pilgrims.
languages.original_text: Являя массам иллюзии, можно снискать немало внимания и привлечь паломников.

traits.locale_text: By showing illusions to the masses, it is possible to gain a lot of attention and attract pilgrims.

languages.text: En montrant des illusions à la populace, il est possible de gagner beaucoup d'attention et d'attirer des pèlerins.
languages.original_text: By showing illusions to the masses, it is possible to gain a lot of attention and attract pilgrims.

traits.locale_text: En montrant des illusions à la populace, il est possible de gagner beaucoup d'attention et d'attirer des pèlerins.

languages.text: 大衆に幻影を見せることで、多くの注目を集め、巡礼者を惹きつけることができる。
languages.original_text: By showing illusions to the masses, it is possible to gain a lot of attention and attract pilgrims.

traits.locale_text: 大衆に幻影を見せることで、多くの注目を集め、巡礼者を惹きつけることができる。

languages.text: 若能通过向民众展示幻象，就可能获得大量关注，吸引朝圣者前来。
languages.original_text: By showing illusions to the masses, it is possible to gain a lot of attention and attract pilgrims.

traits.locale_text: 若能通过向民众展示幻象，就可能获得大量关注，吸引朝圣者前来。

languages.text: Haciendo que las masas se ilusionen es posible ganar mucha atención y atraer a los peregrinos.
languages.original_text: By showing illusions to the masses, it is possible to gain a lot of attention and attract pilgrims.

traits.locale_text: Haciendo que las masas se ilusionen es posible ganar mucha atención y atraer a los peregrinos.

languages.text: Indem man den Massen Illusionen zeigt, kann man viel Aufmerksamkeit erzeugen und Pilger anziehen.
languages.original_text: By showing illusions to the masses, it is possible to gain a lot of attention and attract pilgrims.

traits.locale_text: Indem man den Massen Illusionen zeigt, kann man viel Aufmerksamkeit erzeugen und Pilger anziehen.

languages.text: Halkın dikkatini yanılsamalarla çekerek seyyahları cezbetmek mümkün.
languages.original_text: By showing illusions to the masses, it is possible to gain a lot of attention and attract pilgrims.
